import React from 'react' import { GlobalState } from '../../../../GlobalState' import BtnRender from './BtnRender' function ProductItem({product, deleteProduct, handleCheck}) { const state = useState(GlobalState); const [isAdmin] = state.user return (
{ <> isAdmin ? handleCheck(product._id)}/>

{product.title}

${product.price}

{product.description}

: handleCheck(product._id)}/>

{product.title}

${product.price}

{product.description}

}
) } export default ProductItem
